袒免.definition: to bare one's left arm and take off one's cap as an expression of sorrow

袒庇.definition: to shield; to harbor; to cover up

袒縛.definition: to surrender after baring oneself to the waist and tying one's hands behind

袒膊.definition: to strip to the waist; to be bare to the waist

袒衣.definition: to dress in a hurry with part of the body showing

袒護.definition: to shield (a miscreant) from punishment, criticism etc; to take sb's side
